entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI Omnibus 2003/5. Social-political attitudes in Hungary among the adult population.
entry.dcterms:creator: Dávid, Kriszta

person
survey data
cross-section

A multi-stage proportionally stratified random probability sample representative of the Hungarian adult population. Unsuccessful inquiries were substituted with supplementary addresses, where persons to be interviewed were selected on the basis of the Leslie Kish key.
face-to-face interview

1. block (1-22. quest.): A, 2. block (23-25. quest.): A, 3. block (26-35. quest.) D, 4. block (36-55. quest.): D, 5. block (56-76. and 124-135. quest.): D, 6. block (77-123. quest.): A, 7. block (410-412. quest.): D
